qas.question: Along with classic hits, what type of music do hot adult contemporary stations feature?
What is the primary audience of hot adult contemporary format stations?
What demographic do hot AC stations featuring more pop and alternative rock focus on?
Along with urban and rhythmic dance tracks, what genre is featured on hot AC stations with a younger audience?

context: Hot <a1_0>adult<a1_0/> contemporary radio stations play a variety of classic hits and <a0_0>contemporary mainstream music<a0_0/> aimed at an adult audience. Some Hot AC stations concentrate slightly more on pop music and alternative rock to target the <a2_0>Generation Z<a2_0/> audience, though they include the more youth-oriented <a3_0>teen pop<a3_0/>, urban and rhythmic dance tracks.
